title: Super Tuesday...And Now What
description: Your wrap and look forward after 13 states voted and more delegates were awarded than any other single day this election.  This episode: editor and correspondent Ron Elving, campaign reporters Scott Detrow and Asma Khalid, and host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders.  Find the team on Twitter or at nprpolitics.org.  You can email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
